我们在量子计算领域有了一个新的竞争对手，那就是英特尔。

这款尖端芯片具有 12 个量子位，标志着英特尔开发超越竞争对手的强大量子计算硬件之旅的关键时刻

英特尔独特的量子计算战略

与其竞争对手不同， 英特尔采用了一种独特的方法来进行量子计算，它利用类似于日常 PC 中的计算机芯片中的单个电子。这种方法使英特尔能够利用其现有的芯片技术并推动量子计算的进步。

虽然IBM 、 谷歌、Quantinuum 和 IonQ 等其他公司多年来已经提供量子计算机，但英特尔将传统芯片技术与量子力学相结合，有望在该领域取得更快的进展。

是的，它对标准用户没有用，但是

尽管量子计算机对于日常消费者来说还不实用，但它们对各个行业的潜在影响是巨大的。金融服务公司寻求量子系统的计算能力来发现更有利可图的投资。材料科学研究人员旨在革新电池技术，而制药公司则努力设计更有效的药物。

各国政府还看到了使用量子计算机解码对手加密通信的潜力。传统计算机无法应对这些复杂的挑战，但量子计算利用超小型特殊物理学的能力提供了有前途的解决方案。

量子计算竞赛

量子计算的一个显着方面是不同公司采用的方法范围很广。英特尔使用电子及其称为自旋的量子力学特性，而 IBM 和谷歌则使用由超导材料制成的小型电路。 IonQ 和 Quantinuum 操纵捕获在其系统中的带电原子。

其他方法涉及中性原子甚至光子，光的转瞬即逝的粒子。正如量子计算先驱 Seth Lloyd 所解释的那样，在极小的尺度上，量子力学接管了一切，几乎任何东西都可以变成量子比特。挑战在于有效地操纵这些量子位以用于计算目的。

英特尔的方法和未来的里程碑

英特尔对其选择的量子计算路径充满信心。最近发布的 Tunnel Falls 处理器已经进入制造阶段，英特尔正在积极设计其后续产品以及未来的型号。虽然 12 个量子比特只是实用量子计算机所需的一小部分，但英特尔致力于稳步改进和持续进步。

下一个重要里程碑是实现几千个量子比特，这将使工程师能够解决量子比特操作中的频繁错误。这一里程碑有望在未来三到五年内实现。然而，英特尔预测，拥有 100 万个量子位的变革点可能会在 2030 年代初至中期达到，这有可能改变世界。

Live 95.5 是俄勒冈州波特兰市一家颇受欢迎的广播电台，最近宣布在其午间节目中增加一个令人兴奋的节目。与他们心爱的主持人 Ashley Elzinga 一起，该电台现在将有一位名为“AI Ashley”的兼职 AI DJ。

这一创新举措旨在为听众创造更具吸引力的体验。在 Futuri Media 的先进工具“ RadioGPT ”的支持下，AI Ashley 将每天上午 10 点至下午 3 点收听广播，使用合成语音技术提供音乐、新闻和娱乐的组合。

当 AI DJ 让观众着迷时，Ashley Elzinga 在Live 95.5 Twitter 帐户上分享了她对她的 AI 同事的兴奋之情，如下所示：

我们创造了历史，成为世界上第一个拥有 AI DJ 的广播电台！我们的午间主持人 Ashley 变成了 AI Ashley！我们迫不及待地想让您见到世界上第一位人工智能 DJ Ashley。至于我们其他 DJ 的智慧……我们将把它留到另一篇文章中；） pic.twitter.com/CtlMhYU0IO

- Live 95.5 (@live955) 2023 年 6 月 13 日

世界上第一个收音机上的 AI DJ

Live 95.5 正在拥抱 AI 技术提供的可能性，认识到它在增强广播体验方面的潜力。然而，需要注意的是，AI Ashley 并不是要取代传统主持人 Ashley Elzinga。

该电视台的母公司 Alpha Media 已向 Elzinga 保证，她的角色和薪水将保持不变。相反，AI Ashley 的引入代表了一种混合方法，结合了传统 DJ 和 AI DJ 的优势。

混合方法

Alpha Media 的内容执行副总裁 Phil Becker 解释说，AI Ashley 的集成允许更灵活的广播方法。

虽然传统的 Ashley 将继续出现在某些部分，但 AI Ashley 将处理其他部分。这使 Elzinga 能够参与社区活动、管理社交媒体和处理数字资产。通过取得这种平衡，Live 95.5 旨在优化听众体验并利用 AI 技术的效率。

来自陌生 DJ 的熟悉体验

Live 95.5 了解到，听众最初可能对 AI DJ 持怀疑态度，因为多年来他们已经与他们最喜欢的电台人物建立了联系。为了确保熟悉的体验，AI Ashley 接受了模仿现有电台主持人声音的训练。尽管观众会认出这是人工智能，但合成语音旨在保持联系并以引人入胜且相关的方式提供内容。

感谢您成为 Ghacks 的读者。 欧盟对谷歌采取的立场：呼吁分离广告业务首先出现在gHacks Technology News上。

;

欧盟以其严格和用户友好的政策继续给技术领导者带来困难。欧盟委员会再次起诉谷歌，这次是针对该公司的广告业务。欧洲监管机构再一次发现了广告业欺诈的证据。

由于广泛涉足所谓的广告技术供应链的几乎每个阶段，谷歌正在利用其垄断地位来推广自己的中介服务。有趣的是，美国司法部也在起诉谷歌的广告业务，并希望将其分拆，因为它存在不正当的垄断。

“委员会担心谷歌涉嫌故意行为旨在为 [谷歌的广告交换] AdX 提供竞争优势，并可能排斥竞争对手的广告交换。这将加强谷歌的 AdX 在广告技术供应链中的核心作用，以及谷歌收取高额费用的能力为其服务收费，”欧盟委员会表示。

尽管这是欧盟调查的一个重要里程碑，但今天发布的关注声明并未预测调查结果。在谷歌有机会做出书面回应并要求举行听证会后，委员会现在将评估谷歌是否违反了该地区的反垄断法。欧盟的反垄断监管机构有权对谷歌进行高达其全球销售额 10% 的处罚，如果被判有罪，还可以实施不同的业务改革。

我们对谷歌偏爱自己的在线展示广告技术服务损害了广告技术服务的竞争提供商、广告商和在线出版商的看法提出异议。

我们的初步看法是，谷歌可能违反了欧盟反垄断规则...... pic.twitter.com/rhuTC4fU80

- 欧盟委员会 (@EU_Commission) 2023 年 6 月 14 日

谷歌官方发布公告

谷歌全球广告副总裁丹·泰勒发表声明，表示公司不同意委员会的立场，并将数字广告市场称为“竞争激烈的行业”。

“我们的广告技术工具帮助网站和应用程序为其内容提供资金，并使各种规模的企业能够有效地吸引新客户。委员会的调查侧重于我们广告业务的一个狭窄方面，并不新鲜。我们不同意 EC 的观点，我们将做出相应的回应，”泰勒说。

相关： 谷歌可能被迫出售部分广告业务

如果裁决获得批准，可能会严重损害谷歌的主要收入来源。尽管提供从电子邮件到恒温器的一切服务，这家 Alphabet 旗下的公司仍然从广告中赚取大部分收入。彭博社在早些时候关于今天投诉的报道中表示，谷歌的广告部门预计到 2022 年将为公司创造约 2250 亿美元的收入，约占年度总收入的 80%。

;

如果您喜欢 Mac 上旧邮件应用程序的外部插件，那么这对您来说是个坏消息。根据最近的一份报告，Apple 将放弃对 macOS Sonoma 的旧邮件应用程序插件支持。

根据 AltStore 的说法，对旧邮件应用程序插件的支持将不再对开发人员和用户可用。 “在 WWDC 实验室中确认， macOS Sonoma不支持旧版 Mail 插件。基于 MailKit 的扩展是未来唯一受支持的方法，”AltStore 在其推文中说。

Apple 于 2021 年在 macOS Monterey 中首次推出了 MailKit 框架，允许程序员为 Mac 上的 Mail 应用程序创建尖端且安全的附加功能。可以开发扩展以过滤信息、发送消息、增强安全性和其他功能。

所有人都知道它要来了，预计很快就会被苹果官宣。不过，AltStore 已经拿到了信息，并在推特上发文确认了这一变化。

PSA：在 WWDC 实验室中确认，macOS Sonoma 不支持旧邮件插件。基于 MailKit 的扩展是唯一受支持的方法。

一旦您更新，AltServer 的邮件插件将不再工作，但我们正在研究一种我们希望很快发布的新方法。

- AltStore.io (@altstoreio) 2023 年 6 月 14 日


什么是 Mailkit 框架？

根据Apple 的说法：“MailKit 让您的应用程序包含一个应用程序扩展，可以自定义 Mail 的多项功能。Mail 应用程序扩展提供以下一项或多项增强功能：”

  • 内容拦截器定义规则以防止在用户查看消息时加载内容。
  • 当 Mail 下载邮件时，操作处理程序会执行标记、设置颜色或存档等操作。
  • 撰写会话处理程序验证收件人电子邮件地址，在 Mail 的撰写窗口上显示视图控制器，确认消息是否适合传递，并添加自定义标头。
  • 消息安全处理程序使用加密和数字签名来保护消息。

并非所有插件都可以作为扩展存在，尽管 MailKit 扩展比旧插件更安全且功能更少。自第一个 macOS Sonoma beta 以来，旧版插件无法在邮件应用程序中打开。公众将在今年晚些时候收到更新。

感谢您成为 Ghacks 的读者。 macOS Sonoma 放弃旧版邮件应用程序插件支持的帖子最先出现在gHacks Technology News上。

感谢您成为 Ghacks 的读者。 使用新的 Play 商店过滤器在手机上查找平板电脑应用一文首先出现在gHacks 技术新闻上。

;

借助大屏优化和多设备安装，谷歌对Google Play商店进行了多项修改，努力提升个人用户体验。谷歌最近宣布其新的 Play Store 过滤器将帮助用户更轻松地在市场上找到平板电脑和 Chromebook 应用程序。

据9to5Google 称，Play 商店有一个“其他设备”页面，您可以在其中浏览非智能手机应用程序。此选项仍然可用，但现在您可以使用“其他设备”页面上的过滤器来仅查看专为 Chromebook 或平板电脑设计的应用程序。

在这里，您可能会发现大约 50 个适用于 Chromebook 的“特色应用”，而平板电脑区域只有 28 个。此外，如果您需要进一步集中搜索，您可能会浏览许多专门类别，包括教育应用程序、视频/消息应用程序、手写笔友好的应用程序等等。

智能手机的 Play Store 应用程序有一个指向新设计区域的链接。您不再需要在平板电脑或 Chromebook 上浏览 Play 商店来安装列表中您感兴趣的所有内容，这要归功于一个相对较新的选项，该选项使您可以在连接到您帐户的其他设备上安装应用程序。

检查你设备上的 Play 商店，看看你是否有修改，因为它似乎已经广泛传播。

Google 不断推出新的 Play 商店过滤器

Play 商店在 9 月份收到了“其他设备”的最高选项。它使您能够在手机上探索游戏、电视、Watch (Wear OS) 和汽车 (Automotive) 应用程序。 Apps feed 顶部有适用于 Chromebook 和平板电脑的新标签。

现在还证实，谷歌一直在开发一项新功能，该功能将帮助 Play 商店开发人员处理他们的列表。生成式 AI 工具将通过提供新的评论摘要、自动翻译成其他语言以及一些应用程序推广选项，使开发人员更容易创建他们的 Play 商店列表。

相关： 谷歌“广告”商店：更多广告添加到 Play 商店

谷歌打算将生成人工智能技术纳入其服务和产品中。正如在 I/O 2023 活动上宣布的那样，Play 商店开发人员将很快能够使用生成式 AI 工具的强大功能，利用 Google 的 PaLM 2 语言模型创建他们的应用程序列表。虽然它目前仅作为一项实验性功能以英语提供，但预计很快就会完全部署。

The open source Bitwarden password manager supports biometric authentication. Windows Hello is supported on Windows, so that users may use biometric authentication to access their passwords and other vault data. Up until recently, anyone could use the stored data to access the user's vault without authentication under certain circumstances.

The vulnerability allowed anyone with local access to a Windows machine with Bitwarden installed and Windows Hello unlocking enabled to view all vault contents. Attackers could also use API calls to alter data and have it updated on Bitwarden's server.

Bitwarden may set up unlocking of their vault on Windows through Windows Hello by selecting File >; Settings >; Unlock with Windows Hello in the desktop application. The password manager creates a biometric master key when the option is select and stores it inside the user's credential set on the system.

A correct implementation of the authentication option would prompt users for authentication before access to the vault is unlocked. A post on Hacker One explains that the authentication through Windows Hello was unneeded and that anyone with access to the system could comment out a line to unlock a user's vault without any form of authentication.

The author explains: "The biometric master key can in fact be retrieved with a simple call to the CredRead windows API function, and then used to decrypt the locally saved data present in %appdata%\Bitwarden\data.json. The Windows Hello authentication prompt therefore gives a false sense of security to the user, making it seem as if authentication is needed to decrypt vault data, when in reality it is not.".

The files can be read without elevation and they are accessible to any administrator account on the system as well. The issue affects Bitwarden users who have selected to use Windows Hello for unlocking vault access on Windows devices.

Now Read : how to use the password manager Bitwarden in Chrome, Edge and Firefox .

Fixing the issue

Bitwarden released an updated version for Windows that addresses the issue and implements Windows Hello authentication correctly. New and existing users may download the latest version from the official website . A click on Help >; Check for updates in Bitwarden should return the update as well so that it is installed on the device.

Bitwarden users on Windows need to make sure that they have version 2023.4.0 or newer installed on their devices. The client displays the installed version when Help >; About Bitwarden is selected.

The latest version of the Bitwarden applications includes a new security feature that is asking for a password or Pin at the start of the application when Windows Hello is used. This is found in the Settings as a new option.

In March, security experts recommended not to use a PIN to unlock the Bitwarden vault or to use a very strong PIN, as it would allow anyone with local access to brute force the PIN otherwise.

When Windows 11 was launched, Microsoft went a little nuts and decided to split a chat service that was meant for work and school, and released Teams for Personal users. The problem was that you could not access your contacts from work, so it had an entirely different set of contacts. And since nobody used it, it just ended up as bloatware.

Hey, couldn't we disable the Chat icon in Windows 11 already? Well, that is true, but it only hid the icon, it did not remove the app per se. Does that mean Teams is no longer pre-installed on Windows 11? Tough luck, the app is still pre-installed. This time, however, the Teams Chat taskbar integration is being removed, ie the flyout menu and its functionality are being deprecated. The old icon will be replaced with a Teams Chat shortcut, which acts like a regular pinned app. So essentially you don't have to jump through some screens to hide the icon, you can just right-click on it to unpin the icon. From what I can tell, you will have to uninstall the app manually, but that's quite easy to do. Some reports claim that the app gets removed when you unpin it from the Taskbar, I cannot verify whether this is true.

One thing's for sure, as Windows Central puts it, Microsoft is killing Windows 11's Chat feature. The report also mentions that the change is in the latest dev channel build of the Windows Insider Program, which is Build 23481 . I installed the latest version in my virtual machine, but the option doesn't show up for me, probably because it is being A/B tested. I wonder if the removal of the integration would have a positive impact on the system's performance . Either way this is surely for the better, if you want to use Teams, you open the shortcut to get the app. If you don't like it, discard it with a couple of clicks. This is how it should have been in the first place. Hopefully, this change will roll out to the stable channel of the operating system soon, there's a good chance it might.

But, why is Microsoft doing this? Is it finally listening to feedback from users? Probably not. A blog article by Windows Latest suggests that it is likely that the Redmond company could have made the change after some antitrust concerns in the European Union came to light. In 2020, Slack viewed the inclusion of Teams in Microsoft Office products as giving its rival an unfair competitive advantage, and raised a complaint with regulators in the EU. Recently, a spokesperson for the European Commission had revealed that other complainants had brought up the issue as well, and that they were assessing the situation. Now, if we could only get the EU to tell Microsoft to fix File Explorer.

Bye bye Teams Chat, you won't be missed.

Valve has released a new update for its Steam client that introduces a redesigned interface for the in-game overlay. It also brings the Notes app that we tested a few months ago.

For those of you who missed it, Valve seeded a beta version of the Steam client in April this year with some major changes. The stable version of the desktop program ships with the same changes, and some additional improvements.

Redesigned Menus, Fonts and Notifications

The interface of the Steam client has a new header and footer with a couple of extra buttons, and a new font. The menus that pop-up when you mouse over an option have been refreshed, along with the animations that play.

Even the buttons and fonts in the game install screen have a new design.

The notifications system in Steam's desktop app has been updated, and the green bell icon only lights up when you have an alert. Steam calls this the "tray view" as it only displays new notifications, you may click on the View All button to see a history of all notifications from the app. The notifications manager allows you to configure what it should alert you about, the available options include wishlist item on sale, friend invitation, gifts, trade offers, etc. You can toggle the options to filter the notifications that are displayed.

New In-game Overlay in Steam client

The in-game overlay, which you can access with the hotkey, Shift + Tab, has been redesigned completely. It has a side panel with shortcuts for the following: Game Overview, Achievements, Notes, Guides, Discussions, Steam Workshop, Screenshots, Friends, Web Browser, Controller Settings, Settings, Minimize Windows.

Each tool opens in a new pop-up window that you can drag and rearrange to any place on the screen. The Game Overview section displays your total playtime for the game, and your playtime in the last 2 weeks, and shows a thumbnail of your screenshots. It also lists Top Guides for the game from the Steam Community, and active players in your Friends list.

The next section, Achievements, can be useful to view a list of all the achievements in the game, and the ones that you have completed. The Guides and Discussions shortcuts take you to the Steam Community pages for the game, where you can learn more about the game or discuss it with other players. Likewise, the Steam Workshop shortcut opens the corresponding page for the game, allowing to browse the various mods that are supported, you may choose to subscribe to any that you would like.

Notes app in Steam

The built-in Notes app is probably the best feature in this update, it allows you to jot down things quickly. The Notes are saved on a per-game basis, and you can have multiple notes too, which can come in handy for checklists, reminders, and other things you may want to do in a game. For example: you could save a list of locations or characters that you want to visit, crafting materials to gather, etc. The Notes app in Steam supports rich text formatting, and lets you paste images.

The Notes aren't exclusive to the in-game overlay, they can also be viewed from the game's details page in the Steam client, and are supported on Steam Deck too. Notes that you save are available offline.

Window Pinning

All tools in Steam's in-game overlay have a pin icon that allows you to pin a window to the screen, and resize it per your requirements. So you can play a game with the Notes app pinned, or have a video playing in the web browser. When you pin a window, you can set its opacity level, so it doesn't distract you from the gameplay.

Screenshot Manager

The screenshot manager in Steam's in-game overlay now lets you view all images that you took in the game, change the size of the thumbnails.

The Controller Settings in the Steam client can be used to configure the Steam Input settings for your connected game pad, such as the Xbox One Controller or PS4's DualShock 4.

The new Steam client is available for Windows, Mac and Linux, and supports hardware acceleration across all three platforms for better animations, scrolling and responsiveness. Please refer to the official release notes for a full list of bug fixes included in the update.
